typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PATENT_ORG_NAME as string,
		LOAD_FILE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> PatentSurrogateKey
PatentSurrogateKey sink(input(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		CREATED_DATE as timestamp,
		PATENT_KEY as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
